sentences.sentence: Dispersed repetitive sequence is mainly transposable elements which are composed of transposon and retroposon.
sentences.translation: 散在重复序列主要是可转移因子，可转移因子分为转座子和返座子两种类型。

sentences.sentence: So we started doing transposon mutagenesis.
sentences.translation: 于是我们开始做转座子的突变发生。

sentences.sentence: Retrotransponson is one of the major parts of rice transposon.
sentences.translation: 逆转座子是水稻转座因子的一个主要组成部分。
